item.title: ‘Too Much’ Co-Creator Luis Felber and Star Will Sharpe on the Show’s Original Music, Crafting Felix’s ‘Echo and the Bunnymen Vibe’ and Why Performing Live Was ‘Quite Scary’
item.description: When Lena Dunham and Luis Felber first started dating, playlists were a big part of their love language. “There were moments when we weren’t together — you know, life gets in the way for mid-30-
